name: car code
description: This is a simple API that will return the human readable version of DTC codes (OBD-II Trouble Codes).

api_methods.name: /obd2/{code}
api_methods.description: This endpoint will provide the human readable version of a requested obd2 code

utterances.utterance: Can you tell me what the error code P0420 means on my car's dashboard?
Look up the description for the OBD-II trouble code P0302 so I know why cylinder 2 is misfiring.
I just got a check engine light with code P0171; explain what this code indicates.
Find out what the diagnostic trouble code P0455 stands for in my 2015 Honda Civic.
Please decode the OBD-II code P0133 to understand the oxygen sensor issue in my Ford F-150.
What does the trouble code P0700 mean when it appears on my Toyota Camry's system?
Check the meaning of code P0128 so I can figure out why my engine temperature is off.
Help me identify the problem indicated by the OBD-II code P0442 on my Jeep Wrangler.
Translate the error code P0113 to understand the air intake temperature sensor fault in my BMW X5.
I need to know what the code P0507 means because my car's idle speed seems too high.
